text:
Java version :1.6.0_16
Jmeter Version : 2.5.1

Not able to record HTTPS using the Jemeter.
I am not able to see any sampler with https.If I use http sampler and protocol as https then also not able to record.

Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Please subscribe to the JMeter user list and ask there.
creator: sebb@apache.org
